Getting Started

Source: vignettes/virionData.Rmd
virionData.Rmd
library(virionData)
library(frictionless)
library(kableExtra)

Check available versions of the dataset 

 list_deposit_versions()
  deposit_summary()
#>         id latest_version publication_date
#> 1 15692263           TRUE       2025-06-18
#> 2 15677843          FALSE       2025-06-16
#> 3 15677137          FALSE       2025-06-16
#> 4 15643004          FALSE       2025-06-11
#>                                   doi_url
#> 1 https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.15692263
#> 2 https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.15677843
#> 3 https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.15677137
#> 4 https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.15643004

Get latest version of the data 

# get data
get_versioned_data(dir_path = "outputs")
#> Cole Brookson, Collin Schwantes, Timothée Poisot, Tad Dallas, Greg Albery, Colin J. Carlson, Cecilia A. Sanchez, Renata Muylaert, Evan Eskew, Rory Gibb, & Maxwell J Farrell. (2025). The Global Virome in One Network (VIRION): Data Package [Data set]. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.15692263
#> deposit will download to outputs/15692263
#> outputs/15692263
# list files
fs::dir_ls("outputs/15692263")
#> outputs/15692263/datapackage.json   outputs/15692263/detection.csv.gz   
#> outputs/15692263/edgelist.csv       outputs/15692263/provenance.csv.gz  
#> outputs/15692263/taxonomy_host.csv  outputs/15692263/taxonomy_virus.csv 
#> outputs/15692263/temporal.csv.gz    outputs/15692263/virion.csv.gz

Read the data

Now that you have the data locally, you can read it! The virion files are comma delimited with period decimal markers.


virion <- vroom::vroom(file = "outputs/15692263/virion.csv.gz")

What do the fields mean?

Great question! The datapackage.json file contains field descriptions. It is fairly human readable but we can take a closer look using the frictionless package.


# this function wraps frictionless functions and extracts 
dict_list <- get_data_dictionary(datapackage_json = "outputs/15692263/datapackage.json")

purrr::map(dict_list, function(x){
  kableExtra::kable(x = x) |>
  kableExtra::kable_paper()
})
#> $detection_csv
#> <table class=" lightable-paper" style='font-family: "Arial Narrow", arial, helvetica, sans-serif; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;'>
#>  <thead>
#>   <tr>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> name </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> type </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> description </th>
#>   </tr>
#>  </thead>
#> <tbody>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> AssocID </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Row number from current VIRION version </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> DetectionMethod </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Four harmonized categories in descending order of strength of evidence: “Isolation/Observation,” “PCR/Sequencing,” “Antibodies,” and “Not specified”. In some cases where detection method is not available via metadata, source information is used as DetectionOriginal (e.g., “NCBI Nucleotide”). </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> DetectionOriginal </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Method used for determing the presence of a virus as described in the original work </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> HostFlagID </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> boolean </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Denotes the presence of possible uncertainty in host identification, which users may want to check before proceeding any further. </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> NCBIAccession </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> A unique identifier assigned to a record in sequence databases such as GenBank </td>
#>   </tr>
#> </tbody>
#> </table>
#> $edgelist
#> <table class=" lightable-paper" style='font-family: "Arial Narrow", arial, helvetica, sans-serif; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;'>
#>  <thead>
#>   <tr>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> name </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> type </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> description </th>
#>   </tr>
#>  </thead>
#> <tbody>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> HostTaxID </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Taxonomic identification number from NCBI for host taxa. </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> VirusTaxID </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Taxonomic identification number from NCBI for virus taxa. </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> AssocID </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Row number from current VIRION version </td>
#>   </tr>
#> </tbody>
#> </table>
#> $provenance_csv
#> <table class=" lightable-paper" style='font-family: "Arial Narrow", arial, helvetica, sans-serif; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;'>
#>  <thead>
#>   <tr>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> name </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> type </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> description </th>
#>   </tr>
#>  </thead>
#> <tbody>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> AssocID </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Row number from current VIRION version </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> HostOriginal </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Host name from original dataset </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> VirusOriginal </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Virus name from original dataset </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Database </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Source for the record. One of EID2, Shaw, HP3, GMPD2, PREDICT, OR GenBank </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> DatabaseVersion </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> For static data, a citation. For dynamic data (e.g. Genbank) the access URL and a time stamp </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> ReferenceText </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> A text description of literature sources </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> PMID </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> PubMed identifiers for literature sources </td>
#>   </tr>
#> </tbody>
#> </table>
#> $taxonomy_host
#> <table class=" lightable-paper" style='font-family: "Arial Narrow", arial, helvetica, sans-serif; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;'>
#>  <thead>
#>   <tr>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> name </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> type </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> description </th>
#>   </tr>
#>  </thead>
#> <tbody>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> HostTaxID </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Taxonomic identification number from NCBI for host taxa. </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Host </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Host species name </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> HostGenus </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Host genus name </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> HostFamily </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Host family name </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> HostOrder </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Host order name </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> HostClass </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Host class name </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> HostNCBIResolved </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> boolean </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Indicates whether or not the host taxa could harmonized with the NCBI taxonomy. </td>
#>   </tr>
#> </tbody>
#> </table>
#> $taxonomy_virus
#> <table class=" lightable-paper" style='font-family: "Arial Narrow", arial, helvetica, sans-serif; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;'>
#>  <thead>
#>   <tr>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> name </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> type </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> description </th>
#>   </tr>
#>  </thead>
#> <tbody>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> VirusTaxID </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Taxonomic identification number from NCBI for virus taxa. </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Virus </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Virus species name </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> VirusGenus </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Virus genus name </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> VirusFamily </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Virus family name </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> VirusOrder </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Virus order name </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> VirusClass </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Virus class name </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> VirusNCBIResolved </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> boolean </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Indicates whether or not the virus taxa could harmonized with the NCBI taxonomy. </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> ICTVRatified </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> boolean </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Indicates whether or not the virus taxa is ratified by the nternational Committee on Taxonomy of Viruses (ICTV). </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Database </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Source for the record. One of EID2, Shaw, HP3, GMPD2, PREDICT, OR GenBank </td>
#>   </tr>
#> </tbody>
#> </table>
#> $temporal_csv
#> <table class=" lightable-paper" style='font-family: "Arial Narrow", arial, helvetica, sans-serif; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;'>
#>  <thead>
#>   <tr>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> name </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> type </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> description </th>
#>   </tr>
#>  </thead>
#> <tbody>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> AssocID </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Row number from current VIRION version </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> PublicationYear </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> For literature derived records. PublicationYear provides the year the literature source was published, accessed either from the original database’s reference description or from scraping the PubMed database. </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> ReleaseYear </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> The year a given association was “released” in public information (EID2 and PREDICT) or a publicly deposited sample on GenBank. For PREDICT, all values are given as 2021, given the release of a static file at that time even though some findings may have been published or deposited in GenBank earlier. (This redundancy should be captured in overlap with GenBank and EID2.) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> ReleaseMonth </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> The month a given association was “released” to the public </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> ReleaseDay </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> The day a given association was “released” to the public </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> CollectionYear </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Reports the year of actual sample collection (GenBank and Predict) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> CollectionMonth </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Reports the month of actual sample collection (GenBank and Predict) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> CollectionDay </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Reports the day of actual sample collection (GenBank and Predict) </td>
#>   </tr>
#> </tbody>
#> </table>
#> $virion_csv

#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> ReleaseYear </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> The year a given association was “released” in public information (EID2 and PREDICT) or a publicly deposited sample on GenBank. For PREDICT, all values are given as 2021, given the release of a static file at that time even though some findings may have been published or deposited in GenBank earlier. (This redundancy should be captured in overlap with GenBank and EID2.) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> ReleaseMonth </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> The month a given association was “released” to the public </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>

#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Reports the day of actual sample collection (GenBank and Predict) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> AssocID </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> number </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Row number. Used as an id. Will be specific to a given version of the data </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> DatabaseDOI </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Persistent digital identifer for the database </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Release_Date </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> date </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Date data were released </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Collection_Date </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Date of actual sample collection </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> NCBIAccession </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> string </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> A unique identifier assigned to a record in sequence databases such as GenBank </td>
#>   </tr>
#> </tbody>
#> </table>
